str2: Trustworthy, faithful, believing. From peitho; objectively, trustworthy; subjectively, trustful.
From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To stretch forth, mid: To hanker after, long for, be eager for, aspire to.
From episkeptomai; inspection; by implication, superintendence; specially, the Christian 'episcopate'.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To long for, covet, lust after, set the heart upon. From epi and thumos; to set the heart upon, i.e. Long for.
Properly, beautiful, but chiefly good, i.e. Valuable or virtuous.
From a primary ergo; toil; by implication, an act.
